name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 10, NBC reported that Trump may deport hundreds of thousands of illegal immigrants who entered the United States through the route after taking office.
Among them, Chinese men who are considered to have reached the age of military service will be the first targets of deportation, on the grounds that "they may pose a threat to national security." If China does not accept them, it will consider deporting them to a third country.
However, the article also stated that immigrants who legally arrived in the United States under the Biden administration's two programs (CBP One and Cuba, Haiti, Nicaragua, Venezuela (CHNV) Parole Program) may be exempt from deportation if they have been granted asylum or are applying for asylum, or have other legal status to stay in the United States.
At the same time, this policy is also expected to be subject to some legal obstacles.
However, some sources warned that after Trump took office, even if they may have been granted asylum and would not be considered the first targets for deportation, they may still end up...
fullContent:
11月10日，美国NBC报道称，特朗普上任后可能会驱逐数十万走线进入美国的非法移民。
其中，那些被认为达到服兵役年龄的中国男性，将成为首批遣返目标，理由是“因为他们可能对国家安全构成威胁”。如果中国不接收，将会考虑将他们遣返到第三国。
不过文中也表示，根据拜登政府的两项计划（CBP One 和古巴、海地、尼加拉瓜、委内瑞拉 (CHNV) 假释计划）合法抵达美国的移民，如果已经获得庇护或正在申请庇护，或拥有其他合法身份留在美国，可能免于被驱逐出境。
同时，这一政策预计也会受到一些法律阻扰。
不过也有消息人士警告称，特朗普上任后，即使他们可能获得了庇护，不会被视为驱逐出境的首要对象，但最终仍有可能被驱逐出境。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 10, Hengyang, Hunan. The government's livelihood shantytown renovation project has been in breach of contract for more than 30 months and has not delivered the houses. The owners knelt down collectively and begged the government to make a decision for the people.
November 10, Chengde, Hebei. A petitioner cried loudly outside the court and asked to see the president, hoping that the president would come out to make a decision for the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 10, in Kaifeng, Henan, students who walked to Kaifeng shouted: "Please rest assured, the Party will make the country strong."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Earlier this year, Mr. Li suddenly appeared in the domestic encyclopedia entry and was defined by the Chinese government as an "online traitor." How could a person who reports on social events happening in China become a "Han spy"? What is the relationship between "Han" and this country, and what is the relationship between "Han" and this party-state?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 10, a university in Shanghai also issued a notice requiring students not to easily join any off-campus or unofficial organization activities, and those who did not return to school that day needed to report to their counselors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 10, Peng Chenliang, the only Chinese volunteer soldier in the Russian-Ukrainian war, died heroically in a defensive battle at the end of October. At present, Peng Chenliang's body has been transported back to the base by friendly forces. Peng Chenliang, born in 1994, is from Honghe, Yunnan. He was previously a drone instructor in China. In 2023, he was sentenced to 7 months in prison for "picking quarrels and provoking trouble" for posting remarks on Twitter in support of Ukraine and against Putin. He then fled China and went to Ukraine and joined the International Legion as a volunteer soldier as he wished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 10, a blogger commented on the student night ride: The local government originally wanted to promote the cultural tourism economy, but at a time when maintaining stability is paramount, any new things must be guarded against, fearing that something that cannot be fully controlled will appear. 
Therefore, once there are signs of uncontrollability, or some signs that make them panic, they must sacrifice economic development to maintain stability. 
At present, the Weibo post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 10, in Kaiping, Guangdong, a white car hit pedestrians while vendors were selling vegetables on the roadside, and many people fell to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 9, a banner was posted at the job fair at Zhejiang Normal University: Understand the situation and seek employment rationally, change your mindset and seek employment actively.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 10, Shandong. The blogger asked the old man: Do you feel happy with your life now? The old man replied: Not happy, too tired. There are two children at home. The wedding gift here costs hundreds of thousands. The experts say that the average deposit per capita is 110,000, which is a lie.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 10, Jinan, Shandong. A fire broke out in a dormitory at Shandong Qilu University of Technology. Students questioned that the emergency lights were not turned on and the fire drill door was closed at the time of the incident. Students were blocked in the dormitory by the gate and could only go out one by one by scanning their faces. The dormitory manager ran away first.
School: The dormitory manager did not run away and the investigation is still ongoing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 10 (Released) Jiangxi. The WeChat official account of Wugong Mountain Scenic Area released a picture with a banner that reads "In an unfree era, be a free person"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, Yonhap News Agency reported that a Chinese man used a drone to photograph the South Korean National Intelligence Service building. The police have banned him from leaving the country and will continue to investigate him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 10 (Release), Zhoukou, Henan. A woman who lost both legs posted a video saying that in March this year, her husband forced her to take out a loan to buy him a refrigerated truck. In July this year, her husband had a car accident, which caused her to lose both legs and have them amputated. After she was discharged from the hospital, her husband's family ignored her and insulted her and her mother many times. She is still carrying the loan for her husband's car purchase, and her youngest daughter has a heart disease, so it is difficult for her to make ends meet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, a report revealed that a student union cadre at Xinyang Experimental Middle School in Henan Province privately charged students 300 yuan to return their mobile phones after confiscating them. On November 10, the school issued an announcement: the student union cadre involved had been removed from his position and was awaiting further action by the public security authorities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a verdict from the Guangdong Provincial High People's Court showed that in a wife-killing case, the husband drugged his wife and burned her to death because of his long-term infidelity and trivial matters in life, and faked suicide. He was sentenced to death in the first instance. However, in the second instance, the Guangdong High Court gave him a lenient sentence on the grounds that "this case occurred between family members" and changed the sentence to suspended death sentence. (See the comment section for the full verdict)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Former UMC chairman Tsao Hsing-cheng was included in the list of those to be punished for separatism by China's Taiwan Affairs Office, and even threatened to be held accountable for life.
In response, Tsao Hsing-cheng held an international press conference today and announced that he had filed a criminal private prosecution against Taiwan Affairs Office Director Song Tao and spokesperson Chen Binhua, accusing them of violating the Criminal Law of the Republic of China and committing "intimidation and endangering security". He will appoint a lawyer to file a lawsuit at the Taipei District Court today. Lawyer Zheng Wenlong said that if the two co-defendants do not appear in court, they may face arrest.

content: It was reported online that a certain Zhuhai homeowners group notified party members to provide positive guidance within the homeowners group, "The whole world is paying attention to Zhuhai. If something like this happens at this time, it cannot be ruled out that there are foreign forces causing chaos."

The injured have been sent to four nearby hospitals, one of which has received more than 20 injured people, and the total number of casualties is unknown.
